name: One Night You're Crazy
description: It's like playing tag. Where you collect bloody teddy bear parts. While avoiding a flesh eating wolf. Or maybe you'll be the wolf. I don't care either way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Visa / 7 Processor: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 160 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
